content:
Check:
  all:
    - operator: present_on_multiple_rows_within
      target: DSDECOD
      comparator: INFORMED CONSENT OBTAINED
      within: USUBJID
    - name: DSDECOD
      operator: equal_to
      value: INFORMED CONSENT OBTAINED
    - name: $min_ds_dsstdtc
      operator: equal_to
      value: $dm_rficdtc
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0068
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: When there are multiple informed consents obtained and DSDECOD = 'INFORMED
  CONSENT OBTAINED', the earliest DSSTDTC for each subject should be equal to DM.RFICDTC.
Operations:
  - domain: DM
    id: $dm_rficdtc
    name: USUBJID
    operator: distinct
  - domain: DS
    id: $min_ds_dsstdtc
    name: DSSTDTC
    operator: min_date
    group:
      - USUBJID
Outcome:
  Message: The earliest disposition date for "INFORMED CONSENT OBTAINED" is not equal
    to DM.RFICDTC
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0068
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Date/time of informed consent in ISO 8601 character
                  format. This will be the same as the date of informed consent in
                  the Disposition domain, if that protocol milestone is documented.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: '5.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DS

json.Description: When there are multiple informed consents obtained and DSDECOD = 'INFORMED CONSENT OBTAINED', the earliest DSSTDTC for each subject should be equal to DM.RFICDTC.

Outcome.Message: The earliest disposition date for "INFORMED CONSENT OBTAINED" is not equal to DM.RFICDTC

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Date/time of informed consent in ISO 8601 character format. This will be the same as the date of informed consent in the Disposition domain, if that protocol milestone is documented.
